content.query:
USE ny_taxi_discovery;

-- Line-delimited JSON

SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) AS payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(15)) AS payment_type
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type;
